statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 4 \\ 4 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 28 \\ -14 \\ -24 \\ -33 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
